emerging_technologies.name: AI-Driven Collaborative Development Platforms
emerging_technologies.description: Platforms where AI not only assists in coding but also coordinates development efforts among teams, predicting needs, and automating project management.
emerging_technologies.societal_implications: Reduces human error, accelerates development cycles, and fosters global collaboration. Raises concerns about job displacement in software development roles.
emerging_technologies.adoption_factors: Need for scalable, efficient software development practices; demand for automation in software lifecycle management.

emerging_technologies.name: Autonomous Urban Transport Networks
emerging_technologies.description: A network of autonomous vehicles integrated with urban infrastructure for seamless, on-demand transportation.
emerging_technologies.societal_implications: Decreases traffic congestion, pollution, and enhances accessibility. Raises privacy and security concerns with extensive data collection.
emerging_technologies.adoption_factors: Infrastructure readiness, regulatory support, and public acceptance of autonomous systems.

emerging_technologies.name: Neural Interface for Cognitive Enhancement
emerging_technologies.description: Non-invasive or minimally invasive neural interfaces that enhance cognitive abilities, memory retention, and learning.
emerging_technologies.societal_implications: Potential for cognitive divide, ethical questions about human augmentation, and privacy concerns regarding neural data.
emerging_technologies.adoption_factors: Technological breakthroughs in neural signal processing, societal acceptance, and regulatory frameworks.

emerging_technologies.name: Interplanetary Resource Management Systems
emerging_technologies.description: AI-driven systems for managing resources on other planets, optimizing mining operations, and habitat construction.
emerging_technologies.societal_implications: Expansion of human presence in space, potential for new economic models, and environmental impacts on extraterrestrial bodies.
emerging_technologies.adoption_factors: Technological advancements in AI, robotics, and space travel; regulatory frameworks for space resource exploitation.

mainstream_technologies.name: AI-Driven Code Autonomy
mainstream_technologies.description: AI tools that autonomously generate, test, and maintain code, reducing human involvement in routine software development tasks.
mainstream_technologies.adoption_status: Widely adopted in tech companies, startups, and educational institutions, transforming software development practices.

epoch_themes.description: AI technologies are increasingly integrated into human work processes to enhance productivity, creativity, and efficiency.
epoch_themes.societal_impact: Redefines job roles, potentially leading to a rise in creative and strategic positions, while automating repetitive tasks.
epoch_themes.global_trends: Increased focus on AI ethics, reskilling programs, and AI-driven economic models.

epoch_themes.description: Advances in autonomous systems, energy, and infrastructure aim to make cities more sustainable, efficient, and livable.
epoch_themes.societal_impact: Improves quality of life, reduces carbon footprint, and promotes urban resilience.
epoch_themes.global_trends: Urbanization trends, climate action plans, and smart city initiatives.
